title: The Lincoln Project: Anti-Trump Republican group's new ad slams President over coronavirus deaths hitting 'Greatest Generation'
description: A group formed by anti-Trump Republicans will air a new ad Sunday that slams President Donald Trump's handling of the coronavirus pandemic and for the deaths of World War II veterans and other senior citizens who belonged to the 'Greatest Generation.'

author: Alaa Elassar, CNN
title: This teen invented a watch that warns you about touching your face so you don't catch coronavirus
description: We touch our faces for many reasons: to groom, to gesture, to scratch. The act can even be soothing in times of stress.
content:

title: Jefferson Davis descendent: State flag should represent population
description: Bertram Hayes-Davis, a descendent of Confederate President Jefferson Davis and resident of Mississippi, reacts as Mississippi lawmakers come closer to a historic vote on changing the state flag, the last in the US to include the Confederate emblem.

title: Can governors legally require people to wear masks?
description: CNN legal Analyst Elie Honig answers viewer's questions on the next steps in the legal process in cases against police officers as well as the legality of requiring people to wear masks.

author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
title: Boeing can begin test flights of the 737 Max, FAA says
description: Boeing has received clearance to begin test flights of its troubled 737 Max jet, a spokesperson for the Federal Aviation Administration said Sunday. The test flights of could begin as early as Monday.
source.name: CNN

author: Matt Egan and Clare Duffy, CNN Business
title: Fracking trailblazer Chesapeake Energy becomes the biggest oil and gas bankruptcy of the pandemic
description: Fracking pioneer Chesapeake Energy Corporation on Sunday became the largest oil-and-gas company to file for bankruptcy protection during the coronavirus pandemic.
source.name: CNN

title: Samuel Alito dissents. A frustrating few months for the conservative justice

title: Mississippi House passes bill to change state flag
